definition: عفن ‘afina a (‘afan, عفونة ‘ufūna) to rot, decay, putrefy, spoil; to be rotten, decayed, putrid spoiled; to be or become moldy, musty, mildewy, decomposed V = I عفن ‘afan rottenness, putridity, decay, spoiledness عفن ‘afin rotten, putrid, decayed, decomposed, spoiled, moldy, musty, mildewy; septic │ الحمى العفنة (ḥummā) putrid fever
